extendedInfo.description: Now users can access the Box Office for all BIG Cinemas through smart phones. Presenting the Mobile Box Office. Check show listings, book tickets and even choose your seats, all while you're on the move. The only reason you need to come to the cinemas is to actually watch the movie.

reviews.title: Add pay later option also
reviews.comment: There must b a pay now and pay later option.. Den dis app will b the best app.. There is only a 1 option of payment.. I dont think so its secure kindly fix it as soon as possible. Add pay later option also. Thnx
reviews.author: zareen nigar

reviews.title: Nice app
reviews.comment: Nyc
reviews.author: DI Singh

reviews.title: No listing
reviews.comment: I live in mulund, maharashtra and the big cinemas that is near me is the one in r-mall. But Everytime i want to check a movie show timing itnever shows for r-mall. In fact bookmyshow is a way better app than this.
reviews.author: Ansh Malvankar

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: I am from small town Akola. And glad to see Akola is in the list. I rarely give any feedback on playstore app. But this app worked like charm and forced me to give best rating and honest review. As I am avid lover of Cinema and this app fulfill my need. It gives prior unbiased information about running movies. I could buy tickets via this app and its marvelous experience to choose seats in the middle of last row. I request Big Cinema Team to make option for \'Pay Later at Theater\' mode. \342\231\241
reviews.author: Deepak Gonge

reviews.title: Are you Kidding!!! Hyderabad is not there!!!!!!!!
reviews.comment: Installed app in my mobile and i was shocked and suprised as i couldn\'t hyderabad in the list..  BigCinemas app with out hyderabad....  Hate this app now.......

reviews.title: Not useful for amravti district
reviews.comment: Amravati is bigger city than Akola and others district but not included in it. So, not useful for 25 lakh peoples..
reviews.author: Vaibhav Deshmukh

reviews.title: Sad..!!
reviews.comment: When there\'s an option in their website to select a particular region,  its gotta be there in their app too. Guess thats not the case here. App looks good but lacks many locations which the website has got. Look for your location and use it. If your location is update you\'re good to go..

reviews.title: Poorest app
reviews.comment: No option fr next change also same city have 2 bug cinemas but no detail...poor n pathetic

reviews.title: Please update it
reviews.comment: There is no hyderabad in the list. That shows how focused and dedicated the creators of this app are. It was compulsory that i had to give atleast one star to submit my review. Given a chance I\'d have given negative stars for the app. Same goes for the inox app too.

reviews.title: Superb
reviews.comment: Very handy. Light weighted. Consumes less kb for ticket booking. Works faster even in slower connection.
